shows.title: Dragon Ball
shows.author: Akira Toriyama
shows.description: Son Gokû, a fighter with a monkey tail, goes on a quest with an assortment of odd characters in search of the Dragon Balls, a set of crystals that can give its bearer anything they desire.
movieNames: Dragon Ball: Curse of the Blood Rubies
Dragon Ball: Sleeping Princess in Devil's Castle
Dragon Ball: The Path to Power

shows.title: Dragon Ball Z
shows.author: Akira Toriyama
shows.description: After learning that he is from another planet, a warrior named Goku and his friends are prompted to defend it from an onslaught of extraterrestrial enemies.
movieNames: Dragon Ball Z: The World's Strongest
Dragon Ball Z: The Tree of Might
Dragon Ball Z: The Return of Cooler
Dragon Ball Z: Broly – The Legendary Super Saiyan
Dragon Ball Z: Broly – Second Coming
Dragon Ball Z: Wrath of the Dragon
Dragon Ball Z: Battle of Gods

shows.title: Rurouni Kenshin
shows.author: Nobuhiro Watsuki
shows.description: The adventures of a young former assassin turned wandering swordsman who stumbles upon a struggling martial arts school in Meiji era Japan.
movieNames: Rurouni Kenshin: New Kyoto Arc: The Cage of Flames
Rurouni Kenshin: New Kyoto Arc: The Chirps of Light

shows.title: Yu Yu Hakusho
shows.author: Yoshihiro Togashi
shows.description: A delinquent teenager is killed in a car accident, and is resurrected as an investigator of the supernatural.
movieNames: Yu Yu Hakusho the Movie: Poltergeist Report
